snippet.title: The Super Mario Galaxy Movie - Yoshi First Look (2026)
snippet.description:
Check out the official first look at Yoshi in The Super Mario Galaxy Movie! 

► Buy Tickets on Fandango: https://www.fandango.com/the-super-mario-galaxy-movie-2026-242307/movie-overview/?cmp=Trailers_YouTube_Desc

Subscribe to the channel and click the bell icon to be notified of all the hottest trailers: http://bit.ly/2CNniBy 

► Shop Rotten Tomatoes: http://bit.ly/3KvCU1M

US Release Date: April 1, 2026
Starring: Chris Pratt, Anya Taylor-Joy, Charlie Day, Jack Black, Keegan-Michael Key, Kevin Michael Richardson
Directors: Aaron Horvath, Michael Jelenic
Synopsis: Mario, Luigi and Princess Peach embark on an adventure across the galaxy.
